com.kme.kaltura.kmesdk.webrtc.peerconnection

Interface IKmePeerConnectionEvents

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KmePeerConnectionControllerImpl

    public IKmePeerConnectionEvents

    An interface for internal p2p connection events

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods

      Callback fired once connection is established (IceConnectionState is CONNECTED)
